ROOM_TYPE_RECEPTION.name: Reception
ROOM_TYPE_RECEPTION.description:
The reception ensures that patients get triaged correctly upon arrival, so patients with high risk get prioritized during their visit.

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Nurse - Receptionist

ROOM_TYPE_CLEANING_CLOSET.name: Cleaning closet
ROOM_TYPE_CLEANING_CLOSET.description: Cleaning closet stores all mandatory equipment for janitors.

ROOM_TYPE_WC.name: Restroom
ROOM_TYPE_WC.description:
Room where even a queen must walk. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
None

ROOM_TYPE_COMMON_ROOM.name: Common room
ROOM_TYPE_COMMON_ROOM.description: The common room is the place for hospital staff to rest, study and eat.

ROOM_TYPE_WAITING.name: Waiting room
ROOM_TYPE_WAITING.description: Waiting rooms should be placed within reach of each office, lab and radiology room.

ROOM_TYPE_ON_CALL_ROOM.name: On-call room
ROOM_TYPE_ON_CALL_ROOM.description:
All doctors needed for running a department are based in here.

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor

ROOM_TYPE_NURSES_STATION.name: Nurses station
ROOM_TYPE_NURSES_STATION.description:
All nurses that are necessary for running a department are based in here. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1-3x Nurse

ROOM_TYPE_CORRIDOR.name: Corridor
ROOM_TYPE_CORRIDOR.description:
Mark corridors as this room type to assign the area and equipment to a department and enable automatic lights and janitor's cleaning service.  

Min. Staff requirements: 
None

ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_WARD.name: Regular ward
ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_WARD.description:
Regular ward for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
1x Nurse 
(Personnel based in On-call room and Nurses station)

ROOM_TYPE_HIGH_PRIORITY_INPATIENT_WARD.name: HDU
ROOM_TYPE_HIGH_PRIORITY_INPATIENT_WARD.description:
High dependency unit provides higher level of medical care for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
1x Nurse 
(Personnel based in On-call room and Nurses station)

ROOM_TYPE_OPERATING_ROOM.name: Operating room
ROOM_TYPE_OPERATING_ROOM.description:
Operating room fully equipped for all surgical procedures.

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor - Surgeon 
1x Doctor - Assistant 
1x Anesthesiologist 
1x Surgery nurse 
1x Nurse 
(Personnel based in On-call room and Nurses station)

ROOM_TYPE_DOCTORS_OFFICE.name: Doctor's office
ROOM_TYPE_DOCTORS_OFFICE.description: Basic clinical office for simple examinations and treatments. Staff requirements:\n1x Doctor

ROOM_TYPE_ER_OBSERVATION_ROOM.name: Observation room
ROOM_TYPE_ER_OBSERVATION_ROOM.description:
Many various examinations can be done here, patients are under proper medical supervision. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

ROOM_TYPE_TRAUMA_CENTER.name: Trauma center
ROOM_TYPE_TRAUMA_CENTER.description:
Trauma center serves as the main entry point for critical patients delivered by ambulances and also accepts collapsed patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor - Acute Medicine 
1x Nurse 
(Personnel based in On-call room and Nurses station)

ROOM_TYPE_STAT_LAB.name: STAT Lab
ROOM_TYPE_STAT_LAB.description: The STAT laboratory provides a wide variety of tests to confirm different diagnoses.\nMin. Staff requirements:\n1x Technologist - Biochemist

ROOM_TYPE_INTENSIVE_CARE_UNIT.name: ICU
ROOM_TYPE_INTENSIVE_CARE_UNIT.description:
Intensive care unit provides superior medical care to critical patients to maintain their vital functions. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
1x Nurse 
(Personnel based in On-call room and Nurses station)

ROOM_TYPE_GENERAL_SURGERY_OFFICE.name: General surgery office
ROOM_TYPE_GENERAL_SURGERY_OFFICE.description:
General surgery office is common diagnostic outpatient office. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor

ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_GS_OFFICE.name: Diagnostic unit
ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_GS_OFFICE.description:
Diagnostic unit at General Surgery department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

ROOM_TYPE_DIAGNOSTIC_SONOGRAPHY_UNIT_GS.description:

ROOM_TYPE_CARDIOVASCULAR_DIAGNOSTIC_UNIT.description:

ROOM_TYPE_NEURODIAGNOSTIC_UNIT_NE.description:
Neuroexam unit provides specific neurological examinations.

1x Technologist - Neurologist

ROOM_TYPE_CARDIOVASCULAR_DIAGNOSTIC_UNIT.name: Cardiography unit
ROOM_TYPE_CARDIOVASCULAR_DIAGNOSTIC_UNIT.description:
Cardiography diagnostic unit provides various examination methods and tests related to human cardiovascular system.

ROOM_TYPE_STAT_LAB_NE.description: The neurology laboratory provides a wide variety of tests to confirm different diagnoses.\nMin. Staff requirements:\n1x Technologist - Biochemist

ROOM_TYPE_X_RAY_ROOM.name: X-ray room

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Technologist - Radiologist

ROOM_TYPE_CT_ROOM.name: CT room
ROOM_TYPE_CT_ROOM.description:
CT, short for 'Computed tomography', is a sophisticated x-ray imaging technique for creating high resolution images. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Technologist - Radiologist

ROOM_TYPE_MRI_ROOM.name: MRI room
ROOM_TYPE_MRI_ROOM.description:
Magnetic resonance imaging creates detailed images of the body using magnetic field and radio waves technique. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Technologist - Radiologist

ROOM_TYPE_ANGIOGRAPHY_ROOM.name: CAG room
ROOM_TYPE_ANGIOGRAPHY_ROOM.description:
Coronary angiography is a medical technique also called arteriography that visualizes blood vessels and organs of the body. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Technologist - Radiologist

ROOM_TYPE_RADIO_CARDIO_UNIT.name: Cardiography unit
ROOM_TYPE_RADIO_CARDIO_UNIT.description:
Cardiography diagnostic unit provides various examination methods and tests related to human cardiovascular system.

ROOM_TYPE_HEMATOLOGY_LAB.description:

Min. Staff requirements:
1x Technologist

ROOM_TYPE_MICROBIOLOGY_LAB.name: Microbiology Lab
ROOM_TYPE_MICROBIOLOGY_LAB.description:
Fully equiped laboratory capable to provide cultivation and testing of various samples.

Min. Staff requirements:
1x Technologist

ROOM_TYPE_HISTOLOGY_LAB.name: Histology Lab
ROOM_TYPE_HISTOLOGY_LAB.description:
Fully equiped laboratory capable to provide microscopic analysis of various samples.

Min. Staff requirements:
1x Technologist

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_LOUNGE.name: Lounge
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_LOUNGE.description: Place where visitors can meet hospitalized patients, talk to them, sit and relax.

ROOM_TYPE_ELEVATOR_MARKER.name: Elevator planner
ROOM_TYPE_ELEVATOR_MARKER.description: When using management mode as a planning tool, this can be used to mark where elevators will go.

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_PHARMACY.name: Pharmacy
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_PHARMACY.description: Hospital pharmacy sells medicine to your patients. \nMin. staff requirements: 1x Pharmacologist

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_JANITOR_ADMIN.name: Service office
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_JANITOR_ADMIN.description: This room allows you to hire a manager who increases the overall efficiency of all janitors in the hospital and allows you to assign them to clean individual rooms. \nMin. staff requirements: 1x Janitor manager

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_GIFT_SHOP.name: Gift shop
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_GIFT_SHOP.description: Gift shop sells gifts to family members and friends visiting hospitalized patients. \nMin. staff requirements: 1x Gift shop vendor

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_CAFETERIA.name: Cafeteria
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_CAFETERIA.description: Employee's canteen, place to eat proper meals.

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_CLASSROOM.name: Study room
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_CLASSROOM.description: Employees can train their skills and specializations in the study room.

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_PATHOLOGY_OR.name: Autopsy room
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_PATHOLOGY_OR.description: Pathologists perform autopsies here, trying to figure out the course of a disease and the cause of death. \nMin. staff requirements: 1x Pathologist in On-call room

DLC_ROOM_TYPE_PATHOLOGY_WARD.name: Cold room
DLC_ROOM_TYPE_PATHOLOGY_WARD.description: Cold room can safely hold dead bodies before and after the autopsy procedure.

ROOM_TYPE_ISOLATION_INPATIENT_WARD.name: Isolation unit
ROOM_TYPE_ISOLATION_INPATIENT_WARD.description: Isolation unit is a separate ward used to isolate patients suffering from infectious diseases and to prevent spreading pathogens.

ROOM_TYPE_INFECTIOUS_DISEASES_OFFICE.name: DID office
ROOM_TYPE_INFECTIOUS_DISEASES_OFFICE.description: Infectious diseases office represents the outpatient clinical office for simple examinations and treatments. Staff requirements:\n1x Epidemiologist

ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_DID_OFFICE.description:
Diagnostic unit at Infectious diseases department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients.

1x Epidemiologist

ROOM_TYPE_HEMATOLOGY_LAB_DID.description:

ROOM_TYPE_BURN_UNIT.description: Burn unit specializes in treatment of burns of all kinds.

ROOM_TYPE_TRAUMATOLOGY_OFFICE.description: Outpatient clinical office for simple examinations and treatments. Staff requirements:\n1x Traumatologist

ROOM_TYPE_DIAGNOSTIC_SONOGRAPHY_UNIT_TRA.description:

ROOM_TYPE_ONCO_OFFICE.description: A doctor's office specialising in oncology. Staff requirements:\n1x Doctor

ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_ONCO_OFFICE.description:

ROOM_TYPE_ONCO_NEURODIAGNOSTIC_UNIT_NE.description:

ROOM_TYPE_DIAGNOSTIC_SONOGRAPHY_UNIT_ONC.description:

ROOM_TYPE_OTOR_OFFICE.description: A doctor's office specialising in ear, nose and throat. Staff requirements:\n1x Doctor

ROOM_TYPE_INPATIENT_OTOR_OFFICE.description:
Diagnostic unit at Otorhinolaryngology department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

ROOM_TYPE_DIAGNOSTIC_SONOGRAPHY_UNIT_OTO.name: Sonography unit
ROOM_TYPE_DIAGNOSTIC_SONOGRAPHY_UNIT_OTO.description:

ROOM_TYPE_OTOR_SLEEP_LAB.name: Sleep Lab
ROOM_TYPE_OTOR_SLEEP_LAB.description:
Sleep Lab at Otorhinolaryngology department provides sleep studies for patients who might have Sleep Apnea. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

ROOM_TYPE_DIAGNOSTIC_AUDIOGRAM_UNIT_OTOR.description:

ROOM_TYPE_OTOR_LAB.description:
Ear, Nose and Throat Lab at Otorhinolaryngology department provides special and advanced laboratory tests for specialised diseases which would be hard to diagnoses for normal lab tests. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Technologist - Biochemistry

ROOM_TYPE_OTOR_ENDOSCOPY_UNIT.name: ENT Endoscopy Unit
ROOM_TYPE_OTOR_ENDOSCOPY_UNIT.description:
ENT Endoscopy Unit at Otorhinolaryngology department provides a special room to do endoscopies and advanced biopsies to check if there is any tumours or abnormalities within the patients ear, nose or throat. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Technologist - USG
